斂巴.definition: (dialect) to gather up; to throw together

斂步.definition: (literary) to slow down one's steps; to come to a halt

斂衽.definition: old-fashioned women's obeisance; Taiwan pr. [lian4 ren4]

斂財.definition: to accumulate wealth; to rake in money

斂跡.definition: to refrain; to give up evil (temporarily); to cover one's traces; to lie low; to retire (from view)

斂錢.definition: to collect money; to raise funds (for charity)
